mapper.sql: PLUGIN_ID, PLUGIN_CODE, STORE_ID, POS_ID, PLUGIN_STATUS, PLUGIN_DEPT_ID, PLUGIN_REMARK, BASE_TOOL_ID, STORE_NAME,POS_NAME,BASE_TOOL_NAME, MAN_NAME, BASE_TOOL_MODEL,BASE_TOOL_SPEC,BASE_TOOL_UNIT,BASE_TOOL_STATION
mapper.select:
select
from VIEW_BPBJ_PLUGIN
AND PLUGIN_CODE=#{plugInCode}
order by PLUGIN_ID

select
from VIEW_BPBJ_PLUGIN
AND BATCH_ID=#{batchId}
order by PLUGIN_ID
mapper.insert:
select BPBJ_PLUGIN_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into BPBJ_PLUGIN
PLUGIN_ID,
PLUGIN_CODE,
STORE_ID,
POS_ID,
BATCH_ID,
PLUGIN_BOX,
PLUGIN_STATUS,
PLUGIN_DEPT_ID,
PLUGIN_TEST_DATE,
PLUGIN_REJECT_DATE,
PLUGIN_TEST_DATE_CIRCLE,
PLUGIN_PURCHASE_DATE,
PLUGIN_MANUFACTURE_DATE,
PLUGIN_REMARK,
PLUGIN_NEXT_TEST_DATE,
BASE_PLUGIN_ID,
#{plugInId},
#{plugInCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{storeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{posId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{batchId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{plugInBox,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{plugInStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{plugInDeptId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{plugInTestDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{plugInRejectDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{plugInTestDateCircle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{plugInPurchaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{plugInManufactureDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{plugInRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{plugInNextTestDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{basePlugInId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update BPBJ_PLUGIN
PLUGIN_CODE = #{plugInCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
POS_ID = #{posId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BATCH_ID = #{batchId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PLUGIN_BOX = #{plugInBox,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLUGIN_STATUS = #{plugInStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PLUGIN_DEPT_ID = #{plugInDeptId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PLUGIN_TEST_DATE = #{plugInTestDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PLUGIN_REJECT_DATE = #{plugInRejectDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PLUGIN_MANUFACTURE_DATE = #{plugInManufactureDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PLUGIN_PURCHASE_DATE = #{plugInPurchaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PLUGIN_TEST_DATE_CIRCLE = #{plugInTestDateCircle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PLUGIN_REMARK = #{plugInRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLUGIN_NEXT_TEST_DATE = #{plugInNextTestDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BASE_PLUGIN_ID = #{basePlugInId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
and PLUGIN_ID = #{plugInId}

update BPBJ_PLUGIN
PLUGIN_CODE = #{plugInCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
POS_ID = #{posId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BATCH_ID = #{batchId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PLUGIN_BOX = #{plugInBox,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLUGIN_STATUS = #{plugInStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PLUGIN_DEPT_ID = #{plugInDeptId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PLUGIN_TEST_DATE = #{plugInTestDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PLUGIN_REJECT_DATE = #{plugInRejectDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PLUGIN_MANUFACTURE_DATE = #{plugInManufactureDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PLUGIN_PURCHASE_DATE = #{plugInPurchaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PLUGIN_TEST_DATE_CIRCLE = #{plugInTestDateCircle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PLUGIN_REMARK = #{plugInRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLUGIN_NEXT_TEST_DATE = #{plugInNextTestDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BASE_PLUGIN_ID = #{basePlugInId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
and BATCH_ID = #{batchId}
